title: Distraction Proofing & Household Harmony
summary: Raise criteria for attention, door manners, and independence.

lessons.title: Distraction Work 2 — Moving People/Objects
lessons.objective: Hold cues while people move or mild noises occur.
steps: Cue Down; have a helper walk past at distance.
Reward calm holding; release and reset.
Add mild noises (chair scrape, gentle door close).
supportGuidelines: Increase one variable at a time.
Return to easier criteria after any failure.

lessons.title: Doorway Manners — Advanced
lessons.objective: Wait calmly as door fully opens and guests enter.
steps: Ask for Sit/Stay; open door fully.
Reward for holding; release to greet when calm.
Practice with one guest at a time.
supportGuidelines: If breaking: reduce door opening or add distance.
Use mat stationing for extra structure.
lessons.safetyNotes: Secure doors; mind delivery drivers and bikes.

lessons.title: Independence at Home
lessons.objective: Relax in a different room without handler for short periods.
steps: Settle puppy with chew; go to adjacent room.
Gradually add door closed for brief moments.
supportGuidelines: Track durations in Journal; progress slowly.
Pair with white noise if helpful.
lessons.safetyNotes: Puppy-proof space; use only safe chews unsupervised.
